utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: My lords, and ladies. Today your queen will choose her champion. Here, he will battle for not only her honor, but for a title of his own.

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: But only if he can defeat the Captain of my guard, Sir Horace the Black!

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: Sir William... Wouldst thou fight for my honor?

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: To the death, your majesty.

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: Let's hope it does not come to that, eh? I choose Sir William as my champion.

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: Attack from his left side. I saw his squire bandaging that shoulder this morning. I wish thee luck and strength.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: I fear I shall need all I can get.

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: The Captain of my guard, Sir Horace the Black!

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: Are you sure you wouldn't like to reconsider your choice, my queen?

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: I believe I chose rightly, my king.

utterance.speaker: Sir Horace
utterance.content: Huh!

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: Brave knights, in the honored tradition of our lands, have at ye!

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: I fear you chose most poorly, my love.

utterance.speaker: Chanting Crowd
utterance.content: William! William! William! William!

utterance.speaker: Chanting Crowd
utterance.content: William! William! William! William!

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: William? What is it?

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: Your eyes.

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: William?

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: We need an ambulance at the Camden Fairgrounds.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: You're new.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: You're naked.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: And, for the record, a little bit cold.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: I'm sorry, I didn't know that anyone was home. James had an early call, and I was just leaving.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Without breakfast?

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: I'm fine, thanks. I'm Sam, by the way.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: House. Nice to meet you.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: It'd be nicer if you'd put this on.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: So you and Wilson...

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: Thought you were staying in New York last night.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Sorry, must have missed the "if this trailer be a-rockin'" sign out front.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: I'm really late, so — if there's any chance that we can pretend this never happened, I'd be completely fine with that.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: An eight-year-old with bleeding ears.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: I'll see your bleeding ears and raise you a total muscular degeneration.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: What the hell?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: I had a dream like this once. It didn't end well.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Huzzah, my loyal peasants!

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: House, what are you doing?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Filling in for Rabbi Shmuhl at the Goldstein bris. While I'm busy, you all can check out the Knight down in the E.R., who, instead of seizing the throne, just seized.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: He works at a Renaissance Festival?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Doesn't work there, he lives there as part of a wonderful little troupe, who spend their weekends reenacting a nobler age, when people crapped in the streets, and Thirteen would have been a grandmother.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Weeks, not weekends. Says here he's been camping out for a month.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Try doing that with a pen.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Why don't you put that down before you kill one of us?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Better idea, why don't you give me something I can use so I won't feel the need to?

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Seizure right after a fight obviously suggests concussion.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: Obviously it isn't, or the E.R. wouldn't have called House.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: A full set of armor would protect against visible trauma, but not transmitted concussive force. Could be a subdural hematoma.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: You're forgetting to demonize.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: An evil, satanic subdural hematoma.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: No. Two demon eyes. Hemorrhaging in the sclerae.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Could be an allergic reaction to something from the Renaissance Fair.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Which is why we need to check out Middle-earth. Foreman, take Frodo and break bread with the Hobbits.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: I still think a hematoma is more likely.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: That's why you and Chase are gonna get an MRI.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: But you just—

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: I said Frodo, not Gollum.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Is he saying I have short legs or hairy feet?

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: I don't even know who Frodo is.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Who's the chick, and why are you hiding her?

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: You were home last night?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: And this morning. I bumped into your babe, naked.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: I told you to stay out of my bathroom.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: I was in the kitchen.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: She was naked in the kitchen?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: I was naked.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Why the hell were you naked in the kitchen?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Uh, it's not important right now. What is, is why you didn't want me to meet her in the first place. Is she married?

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: A patient?

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: I don't have time for this.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: She used to be a man.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: House!

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: She wants to be a man. Sam — it's a man's name, short for...

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Samantha. The soulless harpy you were married to before we met.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: People change, House.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Sure. They get older, ovaries start drying up, and nice guys like you look attractive again.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Listen, I know that, in your own demented way, you think you're looking out for me. But I have this.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: By this, you mean a sinking feeling in the pit of the stomach. Fine. I get it. It's your life. You go screw it up. I can wait.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: For what?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: To tell you, "I told you so."

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: No signs of hematoma. Brain looks completely normal.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: Normal, except for the fact that he likes to play dress-up.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: My Uncle used to pretend he was King Leopold.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: I'm not pretending.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: Um, sorry about that. You don't really think you're a Knight, do you?

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: Being a Knight isn't a game. It's a lifestyle, and we do it every day, not just when we play dress-up. We live by a code and uphold ideals, like loyalty, courage, humility.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: And the part where you beat the crap out of each other in armor?

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: That we do for fun. At least it was up until yesterday. Are — are we almost done? 'Cause I'm feeling—

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: Let's get him out of there before he aspirates.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Anything abnormal on the MRI?

utterance.speaker: Man at Faire
utterance.content: God's teeth, what strange manner of garments be these?

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Okay, we'll be back soon.

utterance.speaker: Man at Faire
utterance.content: He consorts with tiny demons in his hand. 'Tis witchcraft, I say!

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Do I look like I'm here to play pretend with you?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Relax, it's not personal. Just tell them you're a time traveler or something. Well, if we're gonna be here, we might as well enjoy it.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Our Knight just vomited inside the MRI. Taub thinks it might be food poisoning...

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Which shouldn't be surprising — outdoor latrines, food prep going on next to livestock.

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: I hear you wish to speak with me, concerning Sir William. How faireth he?

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Not well, or we wouldn't be here.

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: A pox indeed is—

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: Miles. We just thought it was a concussion.

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: He's gonna be okay, right?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: We need to look at the area he was camping out in.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: And you might want to invest into a dental plan for the kingdom.

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: You sure he got sick from something here?

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: We're not sure of anything yet, but...

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: What do you make of this?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Hmm... looks like vomit. Means he was showing symptoms prior to the fight.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: True, but I meant this.

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: Oh, it's a cow eye. From the night before the tournament.

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: He makes the Knights eat all kinds of disgusting stuff.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: He got the idea from Fear Factor.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Why didn't he mention it when he checked into the hospital?

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: I make them all take an oath of secrecy about the ritual. William tends to take his role as a Knight very seriously.

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: Do you think that's what caused him to pass out?

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: That's not exactly sanitary.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Fun stuff never is.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Serious bacterial food poisoning explains seizure and vomiting.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: A lumbar puncture could confirm.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Except it's not food poisoning. If it was, the E.R. would look like Camelot right now.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: All it takes is one bad eyeball.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Or testicle, cow brain, or my personal favorite, pig rectum, with a side order of sphincter.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: I think they call that breakfast in Australia.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: No one else was sick, because they weren't allergic like he was.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: To what?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: That's what I sent you to Middle-earth to find out. Run scratch tests for the samples you brought back.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: That's gonna take time, and he's getting worse.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: So treat him with epinephrine too.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: This should prevent any more symptoms until we can figure out what it is you're allergic to.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: Told you you shouldn't have eaten all that stuff.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: You know, you don't have to stay. I'm sure you and Miles are crazy busy, what with the wedding and all.

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: Miles said we could postpone it until—

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: Don't worry. I'll be fine. I'll be there. I just hope you have a good photographer, 'cause I don't think the standard red-eye filter is gonna work on these.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: I need your right arm.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: That, uh... feels — feels strange.

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: What is it? What's wrong?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: His heart rate's become irregular.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: My — my chest hurts. It feels like it's gonna explode.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Tachycardia — we need to shock him back into rhythm.

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: Oh, my God, William.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: I need his gown open.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: What is — what is that stuff?

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: It's definitely not an allergy, or the epi would have helped him, not made him worse.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Unless he's allergic and allergic to the cure. Sodium bisulfite — the preservative that keeps epi peppy — can cause tachycardia.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: So can Wolff-Parkinson-White syndrome, and it also causes hemorrhaging in the eyes.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: And abnormal electrical pathways in the heart, which could cause seizures.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: But not skin infections.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: There is an infection that can cause skin and neurological damage and spreads rapidly without treatment.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Methicillin-resistant staphylococcus aureus?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Lord have MRSA.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: You weren't wearing gloves when we shocked his heart back into rhythm.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: I'm sure you'll be fine. You two get a sample to the lab to confirm, you get the Knight into isolation and on I.V. antibiotics. You... stay away from me.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Need to talk.

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: About the MRSA? I know, we're—

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: MRSA, shmrsa. Something important.

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: Something you think is more important than the potentially lethal bacteria spreading like wildfire through my hospital? Well, that narrows it down to something personal and stupid.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Wilson.

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: Theory confirmed. He is dating his first wife. I know.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: I don't believe it.

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: That he didn't ask your permission first?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: No, that he's actually capable of keeping a secret from me.

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: Well, you'd be surprised how many things Wilson doesn't tell you.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Would I? Like — like how you slept with your father's best friend or...

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: I'm gonna kill him.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: You need to break them up.

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: Forget it.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: So you'd rather sit back and watch while the evil blonde gorges on Wilson's tender flesh and then tosses out his bones like she did the last time? You remember what he was like after that?

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: Yes, I do.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Well, then do something. God knows he's not gonna listen to me. You, on the other hand, have decades of experience dating and being attracted to losers. Obviously, I don't include myself.

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: You know what happens when you interfere in other people's relationships?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Of course. I do it all the time. Hmm, I see your point.

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: That is why I'm staying out of this. You force him to choose, you might not like the answer.

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: He doesn't seem to be in as much pain anymore.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: That's good, but we won't be out of the woods for sure until the blisters start to recede.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: Hey, I'm really thirsty. You mind getting me a soda?

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: Sure, I'll be right back.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: What's wrong?

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: The pain in my chest, it's getting worse.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Just now?

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: No, I didn't want to worry her.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: So how long have you been in love with her?

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: What? No, we're just friends. Seriously.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: Since the first time I saw her.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Why don't you tell her?

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: She's engaged to my friend.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: The King? Haven't seen him visiting or sitting by your bedside.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: He has responsibilities.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Yeah. I'm guessing the Queen does too.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: What kind of Knight steals his friend's bride? I hate that I even think about it.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: You're not a Knight. You're just a guy.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: But I want to be more than that.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Your chest?

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: No, my — my back. Feels like there's a knife in it.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: Is the infection spreading?

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: It's not MRSA. It looks like some sort of clostridial organism.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: Question is, which type of clostridium?

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: There's hundreds. C. Perfringens?

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: Wouldn't account for his other symptoms. C. Tetani, on the other hand...

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: Tetanus, he — he would have been inoculated against it.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: So he cut himself and didn't get a booster shot. The guy fights people with swords for fun. No one said he's smart.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: They don't just fight for fun. They fight to prove their bravery.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: You're buying this honor stuff? Fighting's not brave. It's just stupid.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: You would say that.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: You think I've never been in a fight?

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: No, I just think you've never won one.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: I took on three guys in college once.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Hope they bought you dinner first.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: It's not MRSA.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: I know, it's poison Ivy.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: Poison Ivy?

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: A severe reaction could cause the blisters and maybe irritate his eyes enough to cause the hemorrhaging, but the chest pain and seizures...

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: They have bonfires every night. The burning leaves aerosolizes the oil. We've seen what it's done to the outside of his body. Imagine what it's doing to his lungs and his sinuses.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: Okay, maybe it remotely fits, but I'd rather go with scientific evidence than with your gut.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: How about this? Apparently, it's all over his sword.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: It's his heart rate again.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: How fast is it?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: It's slowing, why aren't you-

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: It's not MRSA.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: I'm giving him 12 ccs epinephrine.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: He tested positive. You'll blow his heart out!

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: If it slows any more, it's gonna stop.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: I told you.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: And I told you.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: That wasn't caused by poison Ivy.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Or epinephrine. That means the heart problem we ruled out, we now have to rule back in.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: We found clostridium bacteria in the skin samples.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Clostridium's in dirt and basically harmless.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: But opportunistic, if his immune system is depressed.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: Leukemia?

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: He would have had symptoms way before the Renaissance Festival.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Which is true of anything that would compromise his immune system, which means it has to be some other environmental toxin. Yesterday he was a healthy Knight, today he's Sleeping Beauty. Nothing else fits.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: Trichinosis from eating infected meat?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: We already ruled out food poisoning. Both the butcher shop and the food stands at the fair were totally clean.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Then he ate the poison apple somewhere else. Or maybe you just missed it. Start treatment for trichinosis and confirm with a muscle biopsy.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Hey. I can't believe I'm about to say this. Sam…

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Told you so.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: No, she didn't dump me. She wants to get to know you better.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Damn it. I never should have let her see me naked.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: It goes against all my instincts, but I said all right.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: She thinks I was hiding her from you.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: You were.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: I don't want her to know.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: So you're asking me to condone a relationship based on lies and mistrust.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: When and where?

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Tonight, Venezia, 8:00.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: What am I gonna wear? All my cereal boxes are at the cleaners.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: House, listen. I know you're worried about me, and I also know that that kind of unselfishness doesn't come naturally to you. But I don't want your help. I don't need your help. Just come to dinner and be your usual selfish self.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: How could I say no?

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: Miles said he'd stop by later.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: No, tell him not to. I don't want to be seen like this.

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: You're sick, that's nothing to be ashamed of... Un-unless you're saying you want me to leave.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: No, don't.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: I think he's saying it's different with you, Shannon. It's a guy thing — they don't like showing weakness in front of each other. Right William?

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: Right. Maybe when I'm feeling a little better.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: I'm gonna take a small sample of your muscle tissue here. Do you mind waiting outside for this?

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: Don't hurt him.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: He's safe with me.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: I thought you were gonna tell her.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: It's not my call, but if you ask me, she's waiting for you to.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: Knights are supposed to be selfless.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Right, they conquered countries and built Castles by being selfless. Bravery and loyalty are great qualities, for soldiers. If you want to be King, sometimes you have to be willing to take what's yours.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: Ah! She's not mine.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: She's not his either... Not yet.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: It's just dinner. Relax.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Trust me, there is no "just" when House is involved.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: We're in the middle of a restaurant. What could he possibly... Do?

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: That.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Sorry we're late. But you know girls. Always fiddling with the hair and the makeup. James, Sam.... this is Sarah.

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: It's nice to meet you. Horace has told me all—

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: House.

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: House... has told me all about you.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: It's nice to meet you.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: What's the diagnosis?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: His muscle biopsy is clean. It's not trichinosis. House was wrong, this is not environmental.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Or we screwed up and missed something at the Renaissance Faire.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: You think we did?

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: No, but I think House will think we did.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: What could we have missed?

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Fungal infection.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: There's nothing in his blood work even remotely suggesting that.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: It fits his symptoms.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: You wanna re-test every sample we took for spores? We'll be here all night.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Have you noticed how much pain he's been in lately?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: And that's relevant how?

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Extra pain means extra cranky, it means off his game. He's not gonna accept this isn't environmental unless we give him no choice.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: I cannot believe you're from Bloomington.

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: I know, isn't it amazing?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Yeah, delightful.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Ignore him. He's just upset that we're having fun.

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: Do you remember that little bakery, the one with the amazing cupcakes?

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: Gino's.

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: Oh, yes!

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: First stop, every time I go home.

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: Oh, me too...Mmm!

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: Remember that strip club?

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: Girl, I used to work at that strip club.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Where does it hurt, William?

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: My legs, it feels like they're on fire!

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Rhabdomyolysis means his kidneys are failing.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Also means it's not environmental. We need to move on.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: I recommend we start with a full cancer workup, starting with the—

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Which one of you checked out the apartment?

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: House...

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: His symptoms fit an environmental—

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: The test results don't, we redid—

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Search the apartment.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: He hasn't been there in three weeks—

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Go! Now!

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: I liked him better when he was on Vicodin.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: You and Thirteen check out his place. While you're wasting your time, we'll ultrasound the liver. If it's cancer, it's as good a place as any to start.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: I hear House met Sam.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: First time, he was naked. The second time he brought a transvestite prostitute to dinner. Overall, it could have been worse.

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: Great.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: That's your reaction?

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Nudity, prostitute...

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: Sorry, preoccupied.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: House said something to you, didn't he?

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: Nope. He didn't.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: It is a little crazy, though. I mean... isn't it? I mean... things seem to be going great. But they seemed to be going great 12 years ago. The good things are still good. She's still smart, funny, gets me. And she's less competitive. Either she's changed, or I've changed. But, either way... Am I out of my mind?

utterance.speaker: Cuddy
utterance.content: You never know what can happen. You might as well give it a chance.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: Looks like you were right. Tumors... dozens of them. Inside, and on the surface.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Pull in closer.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: See that?

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: What is that?

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: I don't know. But it's definitely not cancer.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Kitchen's clean.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: Bedroom as well. Most dangerous thing in his medicine cabinet was dental floss.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: It's locked, key wasn't on his ring.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: Do you honestly want to go back and tell House we didn't check every square inch of this place?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Of course not.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Ahem...

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: My hero.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: What the hell is this?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Either a secret entrance to Hogwarts, or... our Knight... is a witch.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: Our Knight is into some seriously creepy stuff.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: He claims it's just sugar water but we sent the rest down to the lab for testing.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: Do you think he poisoned himself?

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: It's not poison, we would have picked it up in his blood work.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: Not if it collected slowly in his liver and it all started leaking into his system at once.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: These tumors that aren't tumors, what if they're focal hepatic lesions filled with blood? Every time one explodes it'd be releasing another dose.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Of what?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Plumbum nigrum.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: You putting a hex on someone?

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: It's Latin, for black lead.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Our Knight/Warlock apparently also dabbles in alchemy.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: Lead poisoning.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: Seizures, paralysis, weak immune system, and eventually, coma.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Biopsy the cysts, and you'll find your lead.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: You think we'll make the 7:30?

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: I'm sorry, if I don't change, I'm gonna feel like I'm at work all night.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: Yeah, I remember.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Is it a problem?

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: Not at all. In fact, if we hurry—

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: We will definitely not make the 7:30.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: Well, there's always the 9:40.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Hmm.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: Or not.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Shouldn't you be at the hospital?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Wouldn't need a team if I did all the work, now, would I? Plus, I had to make you dinner.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: We have plans.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: I bet your plans don't taste like this.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Don't! House, whatever it is that you're up to

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: I'm trying to be nice. What I did the other night was juvenile. I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: The souffle was amazing.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: It's my mom's recipe. Everything else, I got off the Web.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Here's to the Internet.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Where I found the lamb ragout, and you two found each other... Again.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Well, it wasn't just the Internet.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: Yeah, more like, divorce, depression, therapy, more therapy, and the Internet.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: And here we are.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Exactly. And here we are.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: Hmm.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Well, I need to go to the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: I think you're old enough, now. But if you would like me to come along with you...

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: I mean, is it safe to leave the two of you?

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: Come on, James. Enough, already.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Yeah, James, I cook in peace.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Okay. I'll be right back.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: You're a cold-hearted bitch, who ripped his heart out. I watched him struggle for years to overcome the damage you did. And there's no way I'm going to just let you reel him back in so you can do it all over again.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: And all this?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Phase two of getting to know my enemy.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: You're wrong about me. But I'm glad now I don't have to pretend to like you, except for when James is standing next to me.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Same here. Only difference is, I'll outlast you.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: End scene.

utterance.speaker: Wilson
utterance.content: Well, it's too late for the movie. Wanna see what's on tv?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Absolutely.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: Love to.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: There wasn't any lead present in his blood work or liver biopsy.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: And his heart rate and BP are getting even more erratic.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: We had to shock it back into rhythm twice during the night.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: There's only one thing left to do.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: We're wasting our time.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Actually, I've already gotten good value.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: I told you, there's nothing here that could have caused any of his symptoms.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: No, you told me that you couldn't find anything here that could be causing the symptoms.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: And now we're gonna find something new because we're in costume? We looked everywhere, tested everything. Just because Wilson's acting stupid doesn't mean we are.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Do you think he's making a mistake?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Of course. But he'll figure it out, sooner or later. Hopefully, after a few weeks of great sex. Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Wilson's not like us. He cares too much about people and their feelings.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Thanks for the compliment.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: The code that our Knight claims to live by, all that crap about honor and chivalry. Wilson's naturally like that, which is why he's—

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: A great guy.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: A sucker and a target. So we gotta look out for him. Do you smell that?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Yeah, it's the apothecary shop. And yes, Foreman and I already...

utterance.speaker: Shop Clerk
utterance.content: I cry your pardon, Sir.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: You know what this is?

utterance.speaker: Shop Clerk
utterance.content: Well, that's lavender.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Try rose hips.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Both harmless, who cares?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: It could be cyanide as far as he knows. How about this?

utterance.speaker: Shop Clerk
utterance.content: It be nothing but St. John's Wort.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Wrong again. Black cohash.

utterance.speaker: Shop Clerk
utterance.content: My Uncle owns the shop. I just started apprenticing. What the big deal?

utterance.speaker: Shop Clerk
utterance.content: Hey! I just organized all that.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: You know what this is?

utterance.speaker: Shop Clerk
utterance.content: A wild carrot?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: It's hemlock, you embossed carbuncle.

utterance.speaker: Shop Clerk
utterance.content: That's hemlock? You sure?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Did you sell it to anyone?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: It's poison; think hard.

utterance.speaker: Shop Clerk
utterance.content: It was just one branch.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: You sold it to Sir William?

utterance.speaker: Shop Clerk
utterance.content: No. To the King.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: It's the only part of the environment you didn't check. The people living in it.

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: What's going on? Why can't we see William?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Because you poisoned him. Your royal anus. With this.

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: Wild carrots?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Hemlock. I need to know how much you used and how you prepared it.

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: You did something to William?

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: No, of course not!

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: He's still alive. You want to avoid a murder charge, start talking fast.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: The apothecary's willing to testify that you're the only one he gave it to.

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: Okay, yeah, maybe I bought it for the food challenge, but I didn't know that was hemlock.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: If it was for the challenge, then why is wee Willie the only Knight who's dying?

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: I don't know! I'm telling you, I didn't know. Why would I want to hurt William?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: I can think of at least one reason.

utterance.speaker: Shannon
utterance.content: Miles, please. Whatever happened, just tell them the truth.

utterance.speaker: Miles
utterance.content: I am! I swear.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: We ran a gas chromatography on his blood. Found trace amounts of piperidine alkaloids.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: The main markers of hemlock intoxication.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Well, the good news is we now know what's wrong with you. The bad news is that your King's precious ideals were just pretend after all. At least, when it comes to guys who get too close to his Queen.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: It's not true.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: I guess you've never heard the expression, "gas chromatography machines don't lie."

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: Neither does Miles. He's the best Knight I've ever known. It's why he was chosen King.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Miles is a jealous idiot. And you're just an idiot.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: Uh, something's wrong. We performed a gastric lavage and administered activated charcoal, but he's getting worse, not better.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Well, it's been in his system two days. We're lucky he's lasted this long.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: If it was hemlock, he'd either be dead already or getting better with treatment.

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: It's hemlock, we found it in his blood.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: He may have had some hemlock, but it's not what's killing him.

utterance.speaker: Lucas
utterance.content: Don't do it! Whatever you're planning, especially if you're gonna use that thing. Geez.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: It was just sitting in a stone.

utterance.speaker: Lucas
utterance.content: Here. It's gonna cost extra, because of the level of detail that you wanted.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Anything good? And by good, I, of course, mean bad.

utterance.speaker: Lucas
utterance.content: Nope, pretty much your typical life. Married young, got divorced. Married a little less young, got divorced. She's been pretty successful in everything she's done, except marriage.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Well, there's gotta be something I can use.

utterance.speaker: Lucas
utterance.content: Maybe. Didn't read her shrink's notes. Didn't seem right.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: But stealing them did.

utterance.speaker: Lucas
utterance.content: Whoa, I didn't steal them. I found a way to obtain them.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: Excuse me, I don't mean to interrupt, but you got a minute?

utterance.speaker: Lucas
utterance.content: Sure. Oh, him? Yeah, I was just leaving.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Careful. I have a sword.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: I don't agree with what you said. But I understand why you said it. We were married young, we both made mistakes, and yes, I did make most of them. But that was almost a decade ago.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: I'm sorry, is that the statutory period for soul sucking?

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: I'm not asking you to like me, House. To be honest, I think you're an ass. But we do have one thing in common. We care about James.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: So prove it. And dump him... again.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: You're pretty much insufferable all the time, aren't you?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Sorry, go on. And, yes.

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: We just reconnected; we have no idea where we're headed. But is it really too much to ask that you give us a chance to find out?

utterance.speaker: Sam
utterance.content: I'm sure I'll be seeing you around.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: We did it. Well, I did it.

utterance.speaker: Chase
utterance.content: What exactly did we do? You do?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: These aren't focal hepatic lesions on his liver, they're peliosis hepatis lesions. Which in combination with an erratic heart rate, usually indicates—

utterance.speaker: Foreman
utterance.content: Endocarditis. Infection on his heart valve.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Two major symptoms of anabolic steroid abuse.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: No, he wouldn't.

utterance.speaker: Taub
utterance.content: And the rhabdo makes the third.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Our patient's a juicer. Ancient poison accelerated the damage of the modern poison. Start treatment; let the King out of the tower.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: How are you feeling?

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: Ashamed.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: You should be. You'll compromise your ideals to win a fight, but not to go for the woman you love.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: That was a game. Not real life. I didn't—

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: Hurt anyone? Try telling that to Shannon. Or maybe I missed something while she was crying by your bed. You don't need to win anyone's heart. You just need to ask for it.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: Miles, is a great guy. He's rich, smart, treats her well. She's gonna have a great life with him. But me? Well, I'd do everything I could for her, but even at my best, it wouldn't be much. And she deserves the best. I guess I'd rather she be happy even if it means I'm not.

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: I guess House was right about that, too.

utterance.speaker: William
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Thirteen
utterance.content: You really are an idiot.
